iti29:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti29:2.2: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti29:2.4: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya ca, bhojane mattaññutāya ca.
iti29:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti29:2.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti29:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
